attributes.review: It took me five hours to download this app ugh I do not recommend you downloading this app 🙄 most definitely it is not a good app this app is so horrible.my WiFi is so low now that I have download this app please don’t download!! I must rate this a one star 💫
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app a pile of poop showed up on my doorstep in my house got egged. My dog even attacked me because of this carrot boy. BLM. Worst app EVER also I almost had a stroke because this fat ugly orange thing showed up on my screen it was scary I had to call my therapist to calm me down 😡
attributes.title: I HATE this carrot lookn az

attributes.review: I saw this game on facebook! I thought it looked fun at first but it kept playing ad after ad and it’s not even fun!! I couldn’t get past the Wall. So unfair. And the graphics are horrible!! The president looks like a old wrinkly orange and do not get me started on the other people in this game. The president was saying awful words throughout the entire thing, it was disgusting it was gross and worst of all, it was actually real clips of the president saying these things. I cannot believe it! Horrible, horrible game. Do not waste your time. I really hope this game gets taken down for misogynist, pedophilia, racist behaviors. No one should have to see this disgusting mess.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: Downloaded this hoping to find anything that would make our president look less like a incompetent dumb ass. Only found more evidence inside a poorly made app.
attributes.title: This app is just as bad as his presidency

attributes.review: My Grandma was IN love with Mr.Trump.He was all she talked about.Everything she wore was Trump merch.She bought a human size painting of Donald Trump.He was nude in that painting if i may add.She also ordered a statue of Trump.He was also umm...naked. But Besides all of that this app caused her to have a seizure.Shes never had seizures in her life.This app it the worst app to exist.
attributes.title: RIP Grandma Joe💔✨😔

attributes.review:
I WISH I COULD GIVE THIS APP NO STARS! My cousin was using this app when the app suddenly went black and then my cousins phone was frozen for about 2 days, we went to metro then they said they couldn’t do anything about it so we went to apple and they said the same thing. We had to get him a brand new phone. This app is horrible
